Overlay.label: Open Overlay File Folder
Overlay.tooltip: Opens the folder where you can find the file that can be included in your overlay.

AutoStart.label: Autostart Timer
AutoStart.tooltip: once live the time will start

AddMinutes.label: Add 15 Minutes
AddMinutes.tooltip: Adds extra time, clears after stream ends

AddHour.label: Add 1 Hour
AddHour.tooltip: Adds extra time, clears after stream ends

DisplayMsg.label: Message that shows before timer
DisplayMsg.tooltip: The message that the bot will display.

EndMsg.label: Message that shows after timer ends
EndMsg.tooltip: The message that the bot will display.

Colors.label: How many colors in your rainbow

ChatEndEnabled.label: Timer has ended
ChatEndEnabled.tooltip: once live the time will start

ChatEndMsg.label: Chat message that shows after timer ends
ChatEndMsg.tooltip: The message that the bot will display.

ChatSoonEnabled.label: Timer ending soon chat message
ChatSoonEnabled.tooltip: When time left equal slider it will output message that the end is near

ChatSoonSlider.label: Timer ending soon warning (minutes)
ChatSoonSlider.tooltip: When the timer hit this it will put out how minutes remaining

ChatSoonMsg.label: Chat message that shows when time left equals slider
ChatSoonMsg.tooltip: The message that the bot will display.

SoundEnabled.label: Timer ended Sound
SoundEnabled.tooltip: once live the time will start

SoundFile.label: Sound file name
SoundFile.tooltip: The message that the bot will display.

SoundVolume.label: Sound Volume
SoundVolume.tooltip: When the timer hit this it will put out how minutes remaining

testSounds.label: Test Sound
testSounds.tooltip: Opens the folder where you can store sound file

Sounds.label: Open Sounds File Folder
Sounds.tooltip: Opens the folder where you can store sound file

P_start.label: Bot Command "!timer start" Permission level
P_start.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_stop.label: Bot Command "!timer stop" Permission level
P_stop.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_gettime.label: Bot Command "!timer gettime" Permission level
P_gettime.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_timeleft.label: Bot Command "!timer timeleft" Permission level
P_timeleft.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_settime.label: Bot Command "!timer settime [00:00:00]" Permission level
P_settime.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_setmsg.label: Bot Command "!timer setmsg [message]" Permission level
P_setmsg.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_setendmsg.label: Bot Command "!timer setendmsg [message]" Permission level
P_setendmsg.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_addmin.label: Bot Command "!timer setendmsg [message]" Permission level
P_addmin.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

P_addhr.label: Bot Command "!timer setendmsg [message]" Permission level
P_addhr.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command
